Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 151 Sheridan buses temp rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago & Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago and Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on train at Jarvis. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on train at Jarvis.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
